1121.content: Which cartoon do you end up in?

choices: Clifford the big red dog/puppy days
11213.content: Which cartoons show do you want to end up?
11213.title: Somewhere else

113.content:
For those who don't know who I am allow me to introduce myself, my name is Ace Jones as I am the star of this special interactive whereas yours truly ends up in a cartoon of some sort. But enough about me it's time to get this special interactive story underway.

It all began one fateful day as yours truly an average 32 year old American morbidly obese yet healthy and very handsome strongman with blond hair and blue eyes along with a super strong singing voice was looking for a cartoon show to watch as everything was normal at first of course, until my own television's screen started glowing as a bright blinding light filled the room itself as I was immediately sucked into my television as the bright blinding light that filled the room faded as I was currently being hurtled toward a cartoon show's own animated world.

Upon arriving in whatever cartoon world I was in I hit the ground with a thud as I was now laying down on my back on whatever animated ground I was on, as a group of concerned animated animals mainly dalmatians who could talk rushed over to where I was at as they were looking down at me in other words a morbidly obese animated dalmatian with blond hair blue eyes and a very handsome appearance along with a very powerful singing voice.

But now the question was what cartoon world am I in?
113.title: Adult

1133.content: Which cartoons world did I end up?
1133.title: Your Choice.

choices: The little lady brings me to her house.
1133331.content:
The animated world I was in happened to be Lilo and Stitch as a lovely young Hawaiian girl by the name of Lilo Pelekai was standing over me.

"Are you okay? Here let me help you up." Lilo said as she helped me get up.

"Thanks a lot little lady and who are you?" I asked.

"My name's Lilo Pelekai what's your name and where are you from?" Lilo asked.

"My name is Ace Jones and I'm not from around here." I replied.

Now what will happen next?

The little lady brings me to her house: Lilo brings me to her house as she tries her best not to let her older sister find out that she brought a stranger or pet to their house.

Something unexpected happens: Something unexpected happens to yours truly.
1133331.title: Lilo and Stitch.

12.content: What age are you in this journey?
12.title: Female

123.content: Any preference on the type of cartoon you enter?
123.title: Adult

info.brief_description: Ever wondered what it'd be like to be stuck in your favorite cartoon with no way out?
info.description:
In this special interactive, you are a person who somehow ended up into a cartoon. Now here's how its going to go down, no ending the story abruptly.

Here's the rules
- No Death
- Sex is alright as long as it is over eighteen characters
- You can change your appearance based on what world you enter.
- No random stuff
- Anime's are okay

Enjoy this journey into animational adventures
